intro.title: A Dark Room
story: You open your eyes.  The room is dark.
As you strain your eyes to see, you think you can see the faint outline of a door.

options.text: Fumble along the walls for a light switch.

lighted-room.title: A Lighted Room
story: After fumbling around the walls, you locate what feels like a light switch and flick it.
Unfortunately, you just flicked the nose of a Zarganian Ipswitch.  It is not pleased that you have flicked its nose.

a-new-friend.title: A New Friend
story: The Zarganian Ipswitch accepts your apology graciously.  Soon enough, you two have become fast friends.

outside.title: Outside
story: As you step through the door, you realize that there isn't actually a floor outside.

lose.title: Ouch.
story: It seems that you have perished in a most agonizing manner.
